problem_text:
(Y. Barnea, A. Shalev). Let G be a finitely generated pro-p group. Must G be p-adic analytic if it has finite Hausdorff spectrum with respect to
a) the p-power series?
b) the iterated p-power series?
c) the lower p-series?
d) the Frattini series?
e) the dimension subgroup series?
A. Thillaisundaram
